overview: AWS is a cloud computing platform that provides a wide range of services including computing power, storage, databases, machine learning, and more on a pay-as-you-go basis.
core_features: Elastic compute capacity with virtual servers (EC2)
Scalable storage solutions with Amazon S3
Managed databases like Amazon RDS and DynamoDB
AI and ML services with Amazon SageMaker
Secure and reliable infrastructure with comprehensive monitoring and management tools
